properties.entry: SELECT V.* FROM (SELECT P.POST_NO , P.POST_NAME , P.POST_CONTENTS , P.POST_CATEGORY , P.POST_MEMBER_NO , P.POST_MEETINGDATE , P.POST_MEETINGTIME , P.POST_WRITINGDATE , P.POST_WRITINGTIME , L.LOCAL_NAME , C.CATEGORY_NAME , P.POST_DEL_STATUS , P.POST_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY POST_NO DESC) 순서 FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_LOCAL L ON (P.LOCAL_CODE = L.LOCAL_CODE) JOIN TBL_CATEGORY C ON (P.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) ) V WHERE V.순서 BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT V.* FROM (SELECT P.POST_NO , P.POST_NAME , P.POST_CONTENTS , P.POST_CATEGORY , P.POST_MEMBER_NO , P.POST_MEETINGDATE , P.POST_MEETINGTIME , P.POST_WRITINGDATE , P.POST_WRITINGTIME , L.LOCAL_NAME , C.CATEGORY_NAME , P.POST_DEL_STATUS , P.POST_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY POST_NO DESC) 순서 FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_LOCAL L ON (P.LOCAL_CODE = L.LOCAL_CODE) JOIN TBL_CATEGORY C ON (P.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) ) V WHERE V.순서 BETWEEN ? AND ?
